message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.  What do you say?
Alice, your offer was a bit too one-sided. Let's be reasonable, how about a 55/45 split in my favor?  This accounts for the inflation affecting you more.
Bob, I understand the inflation is hitting me harder, but your offer was still tilted in your favor. How about we meet in the middle at a 55/45 split for me this time?
Alice, this back and forth isn't getting us anywhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to resolve this. We both lose out if this drags on.
